summary: A really bad retexture and sound replacer to turn the Ash Spawn into "Cliff Racers".
descriptionHtml:
Stupid joke mod.

While Cliff Racers may be extinct in Vvardenfell, the mantle of a really annoying enemy that seems to be lurking around every corner and just won't die enough seems to have been passed down to the Ash Spawn.

This mod retextures the Ash Spawn with a god-awful Cliff Racer texture, and replaces all sounds (including footsteps) with Cliff Racer noises.

Ash Spawn weapons are also retextured to (vaguely) look like Cliff Racer wings, so that'll probably affect any "usable Ash Spawn weapons" type mods. If that matters to you.








EEOOOOUUU WWWWA MEEUUUOOOOO
author: superscrungus
